prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Book language uses three core concepts:  **What** (workflows, tasks, parameters defining the work), **Who** (personas defining who performs the tasks), and **How** (knowledge, instruments, and actions used by the personas).  It supports both flat (simple prompts) and full (structured with tasks and commands) formats.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
